ConditionalEvaluation.name: ConditionalEvaluation
ConditionalEvaluation.label: Conditional Evaluation
ConditionalEvaluation.description: This tool performs a conditional evaluation (if-then-else) operation on a raster.

i.name: Input Raster
i.description: Name of the input raster file.

statement.name: Conditional Statement e.g. value > 35.0:
statement.description: Conditional statement e.g. value > 35.0. This statement must be a valid Rust statement.

true.name: Value Where TRUE (Raster File Or Constant Value)
true.description: Value where condition evaluates TRUE (input raster or constant value).

false.name: Value Where FALSE (Raster File Or Constant Value)
false.description: Value where condition evaluates FALSE (input raster or constant value).

output.name: Output Raster File
output.description: Name of the output raster file.

inputs.name: Input Raster
inputs.description: Name of the input raster file

output.name: Output shapefile
output.description: Output shapefile

iterations.name: Number of resampling iterations
iterations.description: Maximum iterations (if stopping criteria not reached).

prob.name: Random resample probability
prob.description: Probability of random resample or resampling worst strata between [0,1].

threshold.name: Objective function threshold.
threshold.description: Objective function values below the theshold stop the resampling iterations.

temp_decay.name: Temperature decay factor
temp_decay.description: Annealing temperature decay proportion between [0,1]. Reduce temperature by this proportion each annealing cycle.

cycle.name: Annealing cycle duration
cycle.description: Number of iterations before decaying annealing temperature.

average.name: Average the continuous Obj. Func.
average.description: Weight the continuous objective funtion by the 1/N contributing strata.

dem.name: Input DEM Raster
dem.description: Name of the input DEM raster file; must be depressionless.

output.name: Output Raster File
output.description: Name of the output raster file.

out_type.name: Output Type
out_type.description: Output type; one of 'cells', 'specific contributing area' (default), and 'catchment area'.

exponent.name: Upper-bound Exponent Parameter
exponent.description: Optional upper-bound exponent parameter; default is 10.0.

max_slope.name: Upper-bound Slope Parameter (in degrees)
max_slope.description: Optional upper-bound slope parameter, in degrees (0-90); default is 45.0.

threshold.name: Convergence Threshold (grid cells; blank for none)
threshold.description: Optional convergence threshold parameter, in grid cells; default is infinity.

clip.name: Clip the upper tail by 1%?
clip.description: Optional flag to request clipping the display max by 1%.

QuinnFlowAccumulation.name: QuinnFlowAccumulation
QuinnFlowAccumulation.label: Quinn Flow Accumulation
QuinnFlowAccumulation.description: This tool calculates Quinn et al. (1995) flow accumulation.

dem.name: Input DEM Raster
dem.description: Name of the input DEM raster file; must be depressionless.

output.name: Output Raster File
output.description: Name of the output raster file.

out_type.name: Output Type
out_type.description: Output type; one of 'cells', 'specific contributing area' (default), and 'catchment area'.

threshold.name: Convergence Threshold (grid cells; blank for none)
threshold.description: Optional convergence threshold parameter, in grid cells; default is infinity.

clip.name: Clip the upper tail by 1%?
clip.description: Optional flag to request clipping the display max by 1%.

RandomForestClassification.name: RandomForestClassification
RandomForestClassification.label: Random Forest Classification
RandomForestClassification.description: Performs a supervised random forest classification using training site polygons/points and predictor rasters.

inputs.name: Input Predictor Rasters
inputs.description: Names of the input predictor rasters.

training.name: Input Training Polygons/Points
training.description: Name of the input training site polygons/points shapefile.

field.name: Class Field Name
field.description: Name of the attribute containing class data.

output.name: Output Raster File
output.description: Name of the output raster file.

split_criterion.name: Split Criterion
split_criterion.description: Split criterion to use when building a tree. Options include 'Gini', 'Entropy', and 'ClassificationError'

n_trees.name: Number of Trees in Forest
n_trees.description: The number of trees in the forest.

min_samples_leaf.name: Min Number of Samples to be a Leaf
min_samples_leaf.description: The minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.

min_samples_split.name: Min Number of Samples Needed to Split Node
min_samples_split.description: The minimum number of samples required to split an internal node.

test_proportion.name: Test Proportion
test_proportion.description: The proportion of the dataset to include in the test split; default is 0.2.

RandomForestRegression.name: RandomForestRegression
RandomForestRegression.label: Random Forest Regression
RandomForestRegression.description: Performs a random forest regression analysis using training site data and predictor rasters.

inputs.name: Input Predictor Rasters
inputs.description: Names of the input predictor rasters.

training.name: Input Training Points
training.description: Name of the input training site points shapefile.

field.name: Response Variable Field Name
field.description: Name of the attribute containing response variable name data.

output.name: Output Raster File
output.description: Name of the output raster file. This parameter is optional. When unspecified, the tool will only build the model. When specified, the tool will use the built model and predictor rasters to perform a spatial prediction.

n_trees.name: Number of Trees in Forest
n_trees.description: The number of trees in the forest.

min_samples_leaf.name: Min Number of Samples to be a Leaf
min_samples_leaf.description: The minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.

min_samples_split.name: Min Number of Samples Needed to Split Node
min_samples_split.description: The minimum number of samples required to split an internal node.

test_proportion.name: Test Proportion
test_proportion.description: The proportion of the dataset to include in the test split; default is 0.2.

RasterCalculator.name: RasterCalculator
RasterCalculator.label: Raster Calculator
RasterCalculator.description: This tool performs a complex mathematical operations on one or more input raster images on a cell-to-cell basis.

statement.name: Statement:
statement.description: Statement e.g. cos("raster1") * 35.0 + "raster2". This statement must be a valid Rust statement.

output.name: Output Raster File
output.description: Name of the output raster file.

ReconcileMultipleHeaders.name: ReconcileMultipleHeaders
ReconcileMultipleHeaders.label: Reconcile Multiple Headers
ReconcileMultipleHeaders.description: This tool adjusts the crop yield values for data sets collected with multiple headers or combines.

i.description: Name of the input points shapefile.

region_field.name: Region Field Name
region_field.description: Name of the attribute containing region data.

yield_field.name: Yield Field Name
yield_field.description: Name of the attribute containing yield data.

output.name: Output Points
output.description: Name of the output points shapefile.

radius.name: Search Radius (m)
radius.description: Optional search radius, in metres. Only specify this value if you want to calculate locally normalized yield.

mean_tonnage.name: Overall Average Tonnage (Optional)
mean_tonnage.description: Use this optional parameter to force the output to have a certain overall average tonnage.

RecoverFlightlineInfo.name: RecoverFlightlineInfo
RecoverFlightlineInfo.label: Recover Flightline Info
RecoverFlightlineInfo.description: Associates LiDAR points by their flightlines.

i.description: Name of the input LiDAR points.

output.description: Name of the output LiDAR points.

rgb.name: Add flightline info to the RGB colour data?
rgb.description: Add flightline information to the RGB colour data

max_dist.description: Optional maximum search distance, in xy units. Minimum value is 5 x cell size.
